abstract: The federal agency is considering whether to recommend civil legal action against the company over its rating of a 2007 mortgage security.
snippet: The federal agency is considering whether to recommend civil legal action against the company over its rating of a 2007 mortgage security.
lead_paragraph: Standard & Poor’s, the ratings agency, is under investigation for a complex mortgage security called Delphinus that was issued in 2007 just as the housing market began to collapse, according to a financial filing by the company’s parent, McGraw-Hill.

headline.main: S.&P. Target of Inquiry in Securities
headline.print_headline: S.&P. Target Of Inquiry In Securities
